title: Get a migration workflow
description: Gets the details of a specific migration workflow from the BigQuery Migration API. This is useful for checking the status and configuration of the workflow.

objective.narrative: A developer needs to retrieve a single, existing migration workflow by its name to programmatically check its status, configuration, or associated tasks.

regionTags.name: bigquerymigration_v2alpha_migrationservice_migrationworkflow_get
regionTags.title: Get a migration workflow
regionTags.description: Gets the details of a specific migration workflow from the BigQuery Migration API. This is useful for checking the status and configuration of the workflow.
